title: Katie Price and Kris Boyson 'officially back on' and 'moving back' in together
text:

Katie Price and her beau Kris Boyson are "officially" a couple again and have already began "moving his items back" into her mucky mansion - despite it being rennovated.

Their relationship turned sour for engaged Katie and Kris back in August when the glamour model dumped the personal trainer for new man Charlie Drury - however now it seems all has been forgiven.

Blond Kris and Katie, 41, are once again smitten - despite her moving builder Charles into her home during her and Kris' break-up - and are "back to being loved-up again like they never split."

According to The Sun , a source told: "He's taken her back and they're already moving some of his things back into the house.

"They're officially back on - everyone's shocked that he didn't make it harder for her, but they're back to being loved-up again like they never split up."

(Image: Instagram)

Kris and Katie's reunion comes after the busty star was seen leaving Kris' house and then she unfollowed Charlie on social media.

The mother-of-five made the move after the builder refused to sign a Non Disclosure Agreement to prevent him from spilling her secrets.

Katie reportedly confiscated his phone to stop him chatting to his mates about their relationship.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

(Image: YouTube)

The Sun was told: "Katie's taken Charles' phone off him and ordered him a new SIM card, which hasn't arrived yet.

"She's had bad experiences in the past and doesn't want his mates gossiping about her if he tells them any information about the relationship."

The source also revealed that she was letting him message friends through Instagram on his iPad, but he couldn't post to social media, although he broke that rule when he posted a selfie.

Pricey first met hunky Charles on Instagram , and he joined her for a boozy holiday in Turkey last month - while she was still with fiance Kris.

Sources claim that the pair spent a night together in a hotel in August before she had him fly out to the country while she went for check-ups for recent surgeries.

Mirror Online has contacted representatives for Kris and Katie for comment.
description: The glamour model and fitness trainer, who previously hinted that a reunion could be on the cards, are reportedly back together again
